item.description:
Hi Ladies,
I have yet to go to the Living Room! They seemed to have mixed reviews but nothing bad about the food mostly about the people who go there (but we will be there as a group anyway.) I am saying Happy Hour because all of their appetizers are 1/2 off Monday - Friday 4 to 7pm in the Main Lounge. I get off from work at 4pm and could head over there. I am thinking a group of 10 for this event as well.

Their appertizers actually look pretty darn good! :)

I am thinking a Wednesday or Thursday night (but really Wednes). Oh, did you see their Specialty Martini list - EndLess!
item.how_to_find_us: Call/Text Me but I will Check-In with updates as to what to look for!
item.name: Mid of the Week Happy Hour @ the Living Room
